Posts.HTML:
I e tried following what it says i n the document, but im somehow getting it wrong...

Ask ("Are you sure you want to help this man with whatever strange science he has up his sleeve?") {
  If (result)
    msg ("Yes Test")
  } else {
    msg ("No Test")
  }

Try this:

ask ("Are you sure you want to help this man with whatever strange science he has up his sleeve?") {
  if (result){
    msg ("Yes Test")
  } else {
    msg ("No Test")
  }

Note lower case and brackets

Posts.EditableText: Ah, that capital I was ruining it. Thanks
Posts.HTML: Ah, that capital I was ruining it. Thanks

Posts.EditableText:
Sad that Quest is so case sensitive...
It make So muCh troubLe everyWhere!!!
Posts.HTML:
Sad that Quest is so case sensitive...
It make So muCh troubLe everyWhere!!!

Posts.EditableText: The capital shouldn't matter; `ask` is a built-in script command, and `Ask` is a function, but either should work there. (Same difference as `show menu` vs `ShowMenu`)
Posts.HTML: The capital shouldn't matter; ask is a built-in script command, and Ask is a function, but either should work there. (Same difference as show menu vs ShowMenu)
